articles.title: Vietnam Enterprise ICT Intelligence Report 2024 - Vietnam's ICT Market Reached Over $15 Billion in 2023 and is Forecast to Grow at a CAGR of Over 15% During 2023-2028 to Reach Over $32 Billion in 2028
articles.content: Vietnam's ICT market is expected to grow at a CAGR of over 15% from 2023 to 2028, reaching over $32 billion. The growth is driven by digital transformation in the public sector and cloud computing adoption.

articles.title: These 2 Billionaires Just Bought My Favorite Artificial Intelligence (AI) Stock
articles.content: Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing (TSM) is a top chip foundry that is benefiting from the AI arms race. Billionaire investors like Chase Coleman and Steve Cohen have recently bought the stock, which trades at a reasonable valuation and is well-positioned to capitalize on the growing demand for advanced chip technology.

articles.title: 3 Reasons to Buy Berkshire Hathaway Stock Like There's No Tomorrow
articles.content: Berkshire Hathaway, led by Warren Buffett, is a compelling long-term investment due to Buffett's exceptional track record, the company's diversified business model, and its large cash reserves that can be deployed during market downturns.

articles.title: ChatGPT: Everything you need to know about the AI-powered chatbot
articles.content: ChatGPT, OpenAI’s text-generating AI chatbot, has taken the world by storm since its launch in November 2022. What started as a tool to hyper-charge productivity through writing essays and code with short text prompts has evolved into a behemoth used by more than 92% of Fortune 500 companies. That growth has propelled OpenAI itself into becoming one of the most-hyped companies in recent memory. And its latest partnership with Apple for its upcoming generative AI offering, Apple Intelligence, has
